title: Harvard's Mansharamani on New Book
itunes:title: Harvard's Mansharamani on New Book
description:
Vikram Mansharamani, Lecturer at Harvard University, discusses his book "Think for Yourself: Restoring Common Sense in an Age of Experts and Artificial Intelligence." He talks about how the coronavirus pandemic has transformed social interaction.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
